msg: Replaced deprecated FacilityRole reference with FacilityParty.

author: lofwyr
msg: setting version to maven-war-plugin to avoid this Error while building war: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionException: dependenciesInfo : dependenciesInfo

author: thorsten
msg: Fixing Stax implementation regarding content injection. Before we did not reset the xpath after we used it, meaning if you first used a xpath expression in a part and the next part did not provide one we reused the earlier one, which is wrong.
